entry.title: Walter 54A001 - Surfox-T 100Ml-Pkg/6 54A001
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 62.17

[shortdesc]

SURFOX-T

  • This heavy-duty electrolyte solution is composed of phosphoric acid and other additives which makes it ideal for the most demanding weld cleaning applications
  • SURFOX-T is formulated for cleaning TIG, SPOT and PULSED MIG welds (6 per package).
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter

    Extra Product Information

  • Heavy-duty formula

    • Product Information

  • Safe alternative to pickling paste and harsh acids
  • Free from hydrofluoric acid and nitric acid ASTM A967 (ASTM 380) certified for passivation NSF registered for food plant applications
  • Formulated for the most demanding TIG, SPOT and PULSED MIG weld cleaning applications
  • Removes light scaling.
    		•

entry.title: Walter 54A031 - Surfox Marking Solution 100Ml 54A031
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 26.38

[shortdesc]

SURFOX-M

  • SURFOX-M is an electrolyte solution specially conceived to permanently black mark stainless steel on AC (alternating current) mode
  • This oxidation process will leave a dark mark on the surface of stainless steel without altering it
  • Marking on stainless steel is resistant against mechanical and chemical attacks.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter

    Extra Product Information

  • Stainless Steel Marking Electrolyte (black)

    • Product Information

  • Compatible with both permanent and disposable stencils
  • Leaves a black, permanent marking on the stainless steel surface
  • For marking of company logos, barcodes, QR codes, serial numbers, text and other information on stainless steel surfaces
    		•

entry.title: Walter 54A041 - Surfox Etching Solution 100Ml 54A041
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 28.29

[shortdesc]

SURFOX-E

  • SURFOX-E is an electrolyte solution specially conceived to permanently etch into the material on DC (direct current) mode which is available on MINI SURFOX and SURFOX 204 machines
  • Similar to polishing, the etching of stainless steel will remove material and alter the surface.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter

    Extra Product Information

  • Stainless Steel Etching Electrolyte (white)

    • Product Information

  • Compatible with both permanent and disposable stencils
  • Leaves a white, permanent etching in stainless steel
  • For etching company logos, text, barcodes, QR codes, serial numbers and other information in stainless steel
    		•

entry.title: Walter 54A066 - Surfox-G / 5L 54A066
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 85.47

[shortdesc]

SURFOX-G

  • SURFOX-G is specially designed for the electrochemical cleaning of TIG welds on stainless steel and is NSF registered to be used in food plants
  • SURFOX-G successfully removes heat tint from welded areas on stainless steel and dissolves free iron to enhance passivation (6 per package).
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter

    Extra Product Information

  • pH neutral electrolyte solution

    • Product Information

  • NSF Registered
  • Non corrosive formula
  • Less fumes
  • Salt based technology
  • Safe, pH neutral solution
  • Lower environmental impact
    		•

entry.title: Walter 54A085 - Surfox Renew 3.78 L 54A085
entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 38.00

[shortdesc]

SURFOX Renew

  • Highly concentrated, gel-like cleaner for removing rust and mineral deposits from stainless steel
  • Removes contaminants without attacking the parent material
  • Must be neutralized with SURFOX-N™ after use.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter

    Product Information

  • Gel formulation allows the product to cling to inclined surfaces
  • Concentrated formula - can be diluted up to 1:40 with water
    		•
